title: Lag at dragon pit and baron pit
body: I don't know why but when I go to do dragon or baron my fps drops to like 30 when I have like 80-100 fps. I don't recall it dropping like this before like 6.13.

replies.body: There may be an issue with your game files that failing to render the game properly.  We have an[ FPS issue](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide with some troubleshoot steps to help get this fixed up.  Hopefully, you'll be able to find the great drakes again in no time!
I repaired my game twice and its still happening.
